SEARCH
Package Controller

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Entity.User
Controller.Student
public class Student extends User
The Student class represents a student user of the FYP system. It extends the User class and adds additional functionality for registering and managing FYP projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Student(String name, String email, String userID)
    Creates a new Student object with the given name, email, and user ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String email, String userID)
      Creates a new Student object with the given name, email, and user ID. The student's project is initially set to null, and their deregistered status is set to false.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the student.
      email - The email address of the student.
      userID - The unique user ID of the student.

  • Method Details

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Returns the project that this student is registered for, or null if they have not yet registered for a project.
      Returns:
      The student's current project.

    • setProject

      public void setProject(Project project)
      Sets the project that this student is registered for.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to register for.

    • setDeregistered

      public void setDeregistered()
      Sets this student's deregistered status to true.

    • getDeregistered

      public boolean getDeregistered()
      Returns whether this student has been deregistered from the FYP system.
      Returns:
      Whether the student has been deregistered.

    • viewAvailableProjects

      public void viewAvailableProjects()
      Displays a list of available FYP projects that the student can register for. If the student is already registered for a project or has deregistered, appropriate messages are displayed instead.

    • requestProjectAllocation

      public void requestProjectAllocation(Project project)
      Sends a request to the FYP coordinator to allocate the given project to the student. The project's status is also set to RESERVED.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to allocate to the student.

    • requestTitleChange

      public void requestTitleChange(String newTitle)
      Sends a request to the student's project supervisor to change the project's title to the given value.
      Parameters:
      newTitle - The new title to set for the project.

    • requestDeregistration

      public void requestDeregistration()
      Sends a request to the FYP coordinator to deregister the student from the allocated project. Adds the request to the student's outgoing requests and to the FYP coordinator's incoming requests. Adds the request to the FYP coordinator's list of requests.

    • printAllRequest

      public void printAllRequest()
      Overrides the method from the parent class User to print all outgoing requests made by the student.
      Overrides:
      printAllRequest in class User

    • checkReserved

      public boolean checkReserved()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the student has any outgoing requests for a reserved project.
      Returns:
      true if the student has an outgoing request for a reserved project, false otherwise.
